name: Judith - Demo version
description:
"Judith" is a 2D platform/puzzle indie storydriven game set in a dark England during 1800.

Judith's main power is possessing NPCs and objects to achieve a temporary useful ability. Try her power!

Game controls:

  • WASD/Arrows: move player.
  • Moving cursor mouse: move the flying companion (cicada).
  • Left mouse button: possess an item/NPC when the cicada is over the item/NPC.
  • X: Cancel the possession.
  • ESC: Open the game controls info.
  • Spacebar: interact 

In this demo, your main goal is passing the gate to reach the mansion.

Disclaimer: This is a tech demo. Our game is still under early development.

Did you play our demo? If so then we would love to hear what you thought about it! Click here to compile our survey!
